ARABIC: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Certainly your Lord knows what their hearts keep hidden and what they divulge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily your Lord knows what lies hidden in their breasts and what they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily your Lord knows all that their hearts conceal as well as all that they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord certainly knows whatever their hearts conceal or reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed your Lord knows what is hidden in their bosoms, and what they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thy Lord knows what their hearts conceal, and what they publish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thy Lord knoweth surely all that their bosoms hide, and all that they proclaim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Lord knows full well what they conceal in their hearts and what they disclose:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily thine Lord knoweth whatsoever their breasts conceal and whatsoever they make known.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Your Lord knows whatever their breasts conceal, and whatever they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily thy Lord knoweth all that their hearts do hide. As well as all that they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, your Lord knows what they hide in their hearts and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And your Lord knows what their hearts conceal, and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:74] And surely your Lord knows what their hearts conceal, [what these] hide, and what they proclaim, by their tongues.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thy Lord) Muhammad (knoweth surely all that their bosoms hide) of hatred and enmity, (and all that they proclaim) and all that they display of disbelief, idolatry and aggression.
